Creative Commons Labs

Website of the Creative Commons tech team.

Please note, this is an old blog post from several years ago. It may contain out of date information. If you spot anything broken or missing, please file a bug.

Joi Ito Intro

Jun 18, 2008 by frank

CC's CEO Joi Ito kicked off the festivities with an admittedly-stretched but wholly acceptable metahpor: comparing the internet's early battle to promote TCP/IP adoption with our present battles to promote CC's adoption. Joi sees CC as a means of creating a path from a completely closed to a completely open world.

There are two pieces of the framework: the legal and technical piece, and the political piece. This distinction is paramount. Says Joi, "We can't exclude people on the technology level. ...Â  We want Republicans using it.. we want everyone using it."
